CustomField.description: Link to this users account admin profile page on OpenStax Account
CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(Environment__c) == 'dev', HYPERLINK("https://dev.accounts.openstax.org/admin/users/" & TEXT(Account_ID__c) &"/edit/", TEXT(Account_ID__c)),
IF(TEXT(Environment__c) == 'qa', HYPERLINK("https://qa.accounts.openstax.org/admin/users/" & TEXT(Account_ID__c) &"/edit/", TEXT(Account_ID__c)),
IF(TEXT(Environment__c) == 'staging', HYPERLINK("https://staging.accounts.openstax.org/admin/users/" & TEXT(Account_ID__c) &"/edit/", TEXT(Account_ID__c)),
IF(TEXT(Environment__c) == 'production', HYPERLINK("https://accounts.openstax.org/admin/users/" & TEXT(Account_ID__c) &"/edit/", TEXT(Account_ID__c)),
NULL))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Link to this users account admin profile page on OpenStax Account
CustomField.label: Accounts Link
